now i figure out and successfully run this game..
install game apk and don't run it..

heyra12 do as i told in comments. 
put the obb folder in android folder which is in your sd card memory. if your android folder already have obb folder in it then copy the folder inside obb (virtual tennis obb folder) and paste it in obb folder which is in your sd card.

@pdse.
extract obb folder and apk file from one of two zip folder.. after extracting that do what i have told in earlier post.
